description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cjqac","text":"In this protocol, total lipids from miroalgae is extracted with Folch solvent (2:1 chloroform-methanol v/v) and the addition of 5% water. Filter and cell debris is commonly removed by filtration, which is laborious and time consuming. It is also the main reason to either cause sample loss and therefore underestimation; or contamination from filtration system and therefore overestimation. We now use centrifugation to remove filter debris. The extract is then mixed with 0.88% potassium chloride solution to form a biphasic system, where in between the two phases is the thin distinct cell debris layer. The lower phase with extracted lipids is collected and dried under N2 gas flow. The residue is stored under -80 ºC for further measurement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":674,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oj5s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cohsn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5aulc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c0tpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qsj0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"FOLCH J, LEES M, SLOANE STANLEY GH","can_edit":1,"date":null,"doi":null,"guid":"BEBEF3A0490911EAB57859861A33E1A1","id":226,"journal":"J Biol Chem, 1957, 226, 497-509","title":"A simple method for the isolation and purification of total lipides from animal tissues"}},"1":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"Axelsson M, Gentili F","can_edit":1,"date":"1393200000","doi":"https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0089643","guid":"0D850980480D11EC9B9B69717258CCE7","id":1422,"journal":"PloS one","protocol_id":"0","title":"A single-step method for rapid extraction of total lipids from green microalgae."}}}}
